name: Alienation (itch) (ESC)
description:
My very first game.

Specifically made to kill time.

Your feedback is much appreciated!

Programmed, Illustrated, and Composed by ESC

SFX from  Megaman / Rockman series

Recommended Resolution

1920 x 1080

Controls

WASD - Move

Hold Left Mouse - Attack

Upgrade when obtained gears, Downgrade when damaged
